SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Controller
Controller class that handles interactions between the GUI and the data model.
DeluxeRoom
The DeluxeRoom class epresents a deluxe room in a hotel.
ExecutiveRoom
The ExecutiveRoom represents a executive room in a hotel.
GUI_Create
The GUI_Create class is responsible for creating the dialog for adding new hotels, allowing the user to specify the hotel name, room types, and price.
GUI_Main
The GUI_Main class represents the main graphical user interface for the hotel reservation system.
GUI_Manage
The GUI_Manage class is responsible for managing the user interface components related to hotel management functionalities such as adding, removing, and modifying hotels, rooms, reservations, and prices.
GUI_Simulate
The GUI_Simulate class is a JDialog that allows users to simulate a hotel booking.
GUI_toolBar
A custom toolbar component that extends JPanel.
GUI_View
GUI_View class is responsible for displaying the GUI components for viewing hotel information, room details, and reservation information.
Hotel
The Hotel class represents a hotel entity with rooms and reservations.
HotelListManager
The HotelListManager class manages a collection of hotels within the hotel reservation system.
PlainButton
A custom button component that extends JButton.
PlainToggleButton
A custom toggle button that extends JToggleButton.
PlainToolBar
A custom toolbar component that extends JToolBar.
Reservation
The Reservation class represents a reservation made by a guest for a specific room in a hotel.
Room
The Room class represents a room in a hotel, containing details about its name, reservations, availability status, room price, and methods to manage reservations.
StandardRoom
The StandardRoom represents a standard room in a hotel.
